abf95a0a-4635-4b61-81a1-d029db5aa728:::||@!@||:::2025-01-27T01:41:18:::||@!@||:::{"id":"abf95a0a-4635-4b61-81a1-d029db5aa728","title":{"en":"Love Sick Dog"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Lovesick Dog"},{"ko":"러브 시크 독"}],"lastChapter":"68","description":{"en":"\"About 14,000 years ago, certain wolves caught a disease called \"lovesickness\". And when they met people, they became their companion dogs.\"\n\nIf one word could encapsulate Noh Ye-gyum, it would be \"lovesick\". Despite him loving people with all his heart, Ye-gyum finds himself trapped in an endless cycle of being used, betrayed, and ultimately abandoned. This time proves no different for him, as the family of his current \"master\" Jooyung drives him away to pave the path for Jooyung's advantageous marriage and future spouse. Alone once again, Ye-gyum is left to gather his belongings and leave. Or is he? Suddenly, a mysterious man named Jooin appears, sweeping Ye-gyum away to his home. There, he is fed, clothed, and showered with an overwhelming amount of affection. 7a614879-fe2f-40ba-9f92-5e3414cc744e:::||@!@||:::2025-01-27T01:41:20:::||@!@||:::{"id":"7a614879-fe2f-40ba-9f92-5e3414cc744e","title":{"en":"Yoshichou Hanakage Jigoku"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"芳町花かげ地獄"}],"description":{"en":"Set in Yoshi-chou during the Edo period is the story of Ichika, the heiress of Shisen-rou, a teahouse brothel where men sell their bodies. When trying to escape her tragic destiny, she gets caught by the emperor himself—her future husband! Instead of death, she finds herself at the center of a loving family, but can she defy the trope and survive?\n\n---\nLilliana is a neglected princess with a single mission: do not get pregnant. Ever since she woke up in a novel where she will die giving birth to the main character, Lilliana has known that her pregnancy will be her death sentence. However, her mission’s greatest obstacle is her new husband, Emperor Helio. Although they have married for political reasons, the ruthless emperor's fondness for Lilliana drives him to decide that his mission is to win her over. Never dare show your face before me again!”\n\nThis world is drowning in “injustice.”\n\nAn adventurer party leader who treats comrades as disposable pawns.\nA corrupt lord gorging on steak while enforcing tyranny over his starving people.\nA guildmaster firing loyal members with a single accusation of “wage theft.”\nA spoiled noble discarding his fiancée for a new lover.\n\nAnd… a wretched parent exiling their own son for failing to inherit a “desired” ability.\n\nAdel Vandar, the protagonist, vowed to purge this world of such injustices.\nHis resolve was born from bitter experience: branded a failure for his “defective Job,” exiled by the royal family, and stripped of his princely status.\n\nTwo years after his exile, Adel now operates the 《Vengeance Proxy》—a service to eradicate the world’s rampant cruelty.\nAll to wield the divine power he was granted: a Job deemed “useless” by others.\n\n“Lord Adel, today’s client has arrived.”\n\nHis maid, Maya, announces the arrival of another soul seeking retribution.\n\n“Executioner! A jet-black scythe materializes in his grip—\n\n《Demonic Scythe: Igarima》.\n\nOnce mocked as “defective,” this power grows stronger with the target’s sins, enabling him to reap their Job abilities.\n\n“Execution Coefficient: 7,023 points… Another irredeemable scoundrel.”\n\nGripping his scythe, Adel charges forward.\n\nTo execute yet another villain who dares spread injustice in this She has recently fallen for a boy named Katou, who has the exact opposite attitude! \n\nWill the tender-hearted Amane ever tell him how she feels?!\n\n---\n**Trivia:** Sanpaku (三白) is a Japanese term meaning \"three whites\", referring to a person with visible sclera on three sides of their irises (the normal left and right, plus above or below).","vi":"Xin giới thiệu Mizuno Amane, một cô nàng với cặp mắt tam bạch (sanpuku) dữ tợn và trái tim thiếu nữ dịu dàng! Yukinari, who seems to regard people as mere objects, responds to Saichiro's inquiry about why he won't listen to the family by saying, \"I merely execute the sentence.\" Saichiro was dissatisfied with the answer, but then something happened...\n\n(Source: Natalie, translated)","ja":"罪人の“最期”に立ち会えるのは彼ひとり――処刑人・藤田雪成。\n\n時は江戸。現代より頻繁に死刑が執行されていた時代。斬首の執行人である藤田雪成は、その情け容赦ない冷徹な太刀筋で町民から「首切り雪成」と呼ばれ疎まれていた。けれど彼は決して見せなかった。人を手にかける迷いも、苦しみも、そして孤独も。"},"links":{"al":"197327","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047385557"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}}]}

Mas, sob a superfície, espreitam corrupção, pobreza e doenças, todos explorados por vilões traiçoeiros. Com a sabedoria e a força de um antigo imperador, Julius que agora é Juliana não ficará parada. A jovem que antes governava como uma tirana está pronta para purificar o império mais uma vez—desta vez, com suas mãos.\n\nUma história sombria, mas empolgante, de poder, justiça e uma luta contra os males ocultos do império começa!","vi":"\"Juliana, hôn sự của mày đã được quyết định\"\n\nNgay khoảnh khắc nghe thấy những lời đó, một linh hồn nam nhân đặc biệt đã thức tỉnh bên trong tiểu thư bá tước yếu đuối.\n\nJulius, \"Hàn Huyết Đế\". kẻ từng chồng vô số xác chết để trở thành bá chủ lục địa, nay lại tái sinh trong thân thể của một tiểu thư quý tộc.\n\nDù thế giới có vẻ hòa bình, nhưng nghèo đói, dịch bệnh và những kẻ xấu xa lợi dụng chúng vẫn chưa bao giờ biến mất.\n\nGiờ đây, mang trong mình sức mạnh và uy nghiêm của hoàng đế, cô gái ấy sẽ quét sạch mọi tội ác đang vấy bẩn đế quốc này!\n\nĐược chuyển thể từ tiểu thuyết cùng tên, tác phẩm đạt giải thưởng \"Nhân Vật\" tại giải thưởng tiểu thuyết Fantasy lần thứ 16. When he awakens, he’s met with the crushing end of his athletic career, his father’s death, and ruthless betrayal by the gym he once called home. Consumed by rage and grief, Harima vows to claw his way back into the boxing world, not as a fighter, but as a promoter, manipulating the sport’s shadowy underbelly to seize power and profit.\n\nA raw, unflinching tale of those who thrive in boxing’s darkest corners. 9fd06602-f6d5-4a9a-ad10-d4e142e3ffb8:::||@!@||:::2025-02-17T01:45:04:::||@!@||:::{"id":"9fd06602-f6d5-4a9a-ad10-d4e142e3ffb8","title":{"en":"Seikimatsu Tantei Club"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"世紀末探偵倶楽部"},{"fr":"Fin de Siècle Detective Club"},{"en":"End-of-the-Century Detective Club"},{"en":"Sherlock Holmes - Fin de Siècle Detective Club"}],"lastChapter":"3","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Seikimatsu Tantei Club is dedicated to the very gay and very passionate love of Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson. It's blatantly based on Conan Doyle's work, and many of his characters make appearances throughout the story. In fact, the main story is split into three sub-stories -- each one focusing on a different aspect of the Holmes/Watson relationship.The first story is titled Paris Fin de Siècle, and is a light-hearted introduction to our protagonists. There's a little fluff, a little humor, a sardonic reunion with Arsène Lupin, and a sexually charged scene of boot-licking. (Actual boot-licking. Not the metaphorical kind!) There are also fabulous kisses, cross-dressing criminals and unusual confessions. No smut so far, though. That comes later on. Oh, yes.The last two stories are based on actual Conan Doyle plots. The second story is based on and named after The Adventure of the Three Garridebs, and the third is similarly inspired by A Scandal in Bohemia. It's wonderful to see Conan Doyle re-interpreted through a yaoi mangaka's eyes! It's particularly rewarding to see Holmes undergo a paradigm shift after Watson is shot in The Three Garridebs; Holmes realizes that he can't take the good doctor for granted anymore, and that his old friend has become so much more than a friend to him."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/世紀末探偵倶楽部-四谷シモーヌ-ebook/dp/B00HF3FXDE","ap":"seikimatsu-tantei-club","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/232603/","kt":"seikimatsu-tantei-kurabu","mal":"9290","mu":"qcaxpvq"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}
